Heads on Crooked
About

Mask on straight, Head on Crooked.
Heads on Crooked is the antidote to kitchen sink dramas.
As an international theatre collective based in Edinburgh, we are committed to destigmatizing avant-garde theatre and in so doing; create joy, laughter, and community in Scotland’s capital city.
